name: The Apocalypse Assembly
description:
************** IMPORTANT**************

**** PATHFINDING BUG IN HTML IF YOUR UNITS WILL NOT MOVE TRY ANOTHER BROWSER OR DOWNLOAD THE EXE TO PLAY****

(If anyone knows how to fix this bug with Godot's NavigationAgent2D in HTML, please let me know.)

The Apocalypse Assembly

In this fast-paced real-time strategy game, you play as an all-powerful AI with one goal: the extermination of humanity. Utilize resource mining to build and upgrade your robotic army, customizing each unit with a variety of components to optimize their performance. Withstand wave after wave of human attacks as you relentlessly march toward the ultimate objective: the destruction of all human bases. Will you emerge victorious as the ultimate machine ruler? Play now and find out!

Created for Godot Wild Jam # 53
